summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Bonus Wallet System Phase 1. Backend APIs working perfectly (8/9 endpoints), dual wallet system implemented correctly, admin dashboard includes bonus stats, wallet adjustment functionality working. Frontend shows dual wallet cards, bonus tasks page, and proper navigation. Minor issue with load-to-game validation due to no games in test environment.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Returns 404 'Game not found or inactive' when testing with non-existent game ID
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Expected behavior - no games configured in test environment

passed_tests: Backend: Portal token validation API (200 OK)
Backend: Portal wallets API with dual wallet structure (200 OK)
Backend: Portal bonus tasks API with milestone tracking (200 OK)
Backend: Admin dashboard stats with bonus distributed field (200 OK)
Backend: Admin client detail with wallet balances (200 OK)
Backend: Admin bonus wallet adjustment (+$5.00 successful)
Frontend: Portal dashboard with dual wallet cards (Real: $0.00, Bonus: $5.00)
Frontend: Dual wallet system display with proper gradients
Frontend: Referral progress tracking and tier display
Frontend: Recent activity showing bonus adjustment transaction
Frontend: Quick action buttons for Load, Games, History, Cashout
Frontend: Bonus wallet balance updated after admin adjustment
Frontend: Responsive design with proper mobile viewport
